content: SafeGrocery

SafeGrocery is a personalized grocery shopping service for individuals with allergies and intolerances. Our platform takes the guesswork out of grocery shopping and provides you with a tailored list of products that are safe for you to consume.
Personalized grocery shopping, Tailored list of products, Safe for allergies and intolerances, Easy to use platform, Saves time
Spokin, Allergies At Home, AllergyEats, Allergy Amulet
SafeGrocery goes beyond just providing a list of safe products. We use our expert knowledge and research to provide you with the safest options that meet your eating requirements.
Alleviate Foods

Alleviate Foods is a subscription-based service that delivers customized meal kits to individuals with allergies and intolerances. Our meal kits are prepared in an allergen-free facility and are tailored to meet your specific dietary requirements.
Customized meal kits, Allergen-free facility, Safe for allergies and intolerances, Easy to prepare recipes, Flexible subscription
Cook It, Freshly, Green Chef, Sun Basket, Blue Apron

Alleviate Foods' meal kits are prepared in an allergen-free facility, eliminating the risk of cross-contamination. Our recipes are easy to prepare and are tailored to meet your specific dietary requirements.
AllergyRX

AllergyRX is a mobile application that scans product labels and provides you with an easy-to-read report of potential allergens. Our AI-powered technology detects even the slightest trace of allergens, providing you with complete peace of mind while grocery shopping.
AI-powered technology, Scans product labels, Easy-to-read reports, Detects even slightest traces of allergens, Saves time
Spoon Guru, Allerguarder, FoodMaestro, Is It Gluten Free, Scan Halal

AllergyRX has a more advanced allergy detection system than its competitors, detecting even the slightest traces of allergens that others may miss. It also provides easy-to-read reports that can be accessed quickly on your mobile device.
Allergy-Free Pantry

Allergy-Free Pantry is an online marketplace that offers a wide range of allergy-friendly products. We carefully select each product, ensuring that it meets all safety requirements for allergies and intolerances.
Wide range of products, Carefully selected, Safe for allergies and intolerances, Easy to navigate website, Competitive pricing
Thrive Market, Pure Encapsulations, Nuts.com, GoodnessMe Box, Lucky Vitamin

Allergy-Free Pantry's products are carefully selected to ensure that they meet all safety requirements for allergies and intolerances. Our website is easy to navigate, making it quick and simple to find the products you need.
pain_point_description: grocery shoppers who have allergies or intolerances need help finding products that are safe for them to consume. they often have to spend lots of time reading labels, but still are not confident that they are completely safe. they need a service that does the research for them and provides them with the safest products for their eating requirements
